events.text:
STOP THROWING MY CITIZENS AROUND!!!!
That's it! I'm revoking your esteemed title!
There is zero tolerance for bullying and harrassment in the Boggle Kingdom!
Visit my Curious Serpent to receive your sentencing!

events.question: Things are SO much better around here now that a REAL leader is in charge!

events.text:
What do you mean?!
You can't possibly be talking about those diabolical freeloaders who lived here before...
The new citizens of Boggle Castle are docile and obedient. A dream come true!

Ah yes, my [color=#ffc740]Bovine Battalion[/color]! Thanks to you we are becoming quite a big player in the this free market.
I am told that our furry friends will fetch a high price when the next Archdemon comes to collect their living souls.
And by the time that visit comes, Boggle will be RICH!!! HAHAHAHA!

Oh yes, right! I promised the mortal I would grant them a wish and a title.
Esteemed mortal... I hereby declare you will be forever known as [color=#ff0000]Lord VC Reaper[/color]!!!
You serve a legitimate Archdemon now so if you're up for a task...
Go visit our disgraced comrade, [color=#38f5bc]Archdemon[/color] Maldoror, in the prison beside the gates to the Keep.
But don't visit for too long! She is quite a manipulative little devil.

.......
Aren't you persistent?!
Right! Your wish...

events.question: If you could gain a new ability what would you choose?

events.text:
Ahhhh. How predictable.
I learned this spell called [color=#aeffac]lodger979[/color] from a wizard that fell from the sky to their death.
Perhaps you will find [color=#aeffac]lodger979[/color] useful to reach great heights.

Interesting... Are you sure? Hm.
I learned this spell called [color=#aeffac]cowboy555[/color] from a rancher that lost a diabolical lottery.
Tragically this rancher could not outrun their untimely crucifixion at the hands of men that act like dogs.
Perhaps you will find [color=#aeffac]cowboy555[/color] useful to run faster!

Odd. Hmph. Let's see...
I learned this spell called [color=#aeffac]pureevil1[/color] but it's quite dangerous...
In fact, this is the spell that allowed me to lead my siege on [color=#08ff00]Coldheart Castle Keep[/color]! MUAHAHA!
Perhaps you will find [color=#aeffac]pureevil1[/color] useful in whatever-it-is you do, my liege.

Very good, my liege.
Now go visit our disgraced comrade, [color=#38f5bc]Archdemon[/color] Maldoror, in the prison beside the gates to the Keep.
